experience.title: Experience
experience.internDesc: Automation and end-user testing for Navy-Marine Corps Intranet
experience.fellowDesc: Built and deployed 5 AI projects in 7 weeks using React JS, Next.js, Firebase, Clerk, and Vercel. Developed interactive customer support agents and AI-powered applications.
experience.developerDesc: Frontend development using Vue.js and React.js, configured Stripe payment system, and managed user authentication with OAuth and Firebase.

sentinel.title: Sentinel
sentinel.description: Cybersecurity Intelligence Agent that processes real-time CVE data and security news using LangChain and OpenAI GPT-4. Features multi-language scraping, intelligent classification, and email delivery support.

pinyImage.title: PinyImage
pinyImage.description: Create meaningful mental images to remember Mandarin characters forever! AI-powered tool that leverages visual memory to enhance Chinese character memorization.

languageClassifier.title: Language Classifier
languageClassifier.description: Neural network-based language classifier that identifies Romance languages and English with 96% accuracy using PyTorch and n-gram analysis.
